scripts.watch: node node_modules/build/bin/watch-content.js & node node_modules/build/bin/watch-css.js & node node_modules/build/bin/watch-js.js & node node_modules/build/bin/watch-img.js & node node_modules/build/bin/watch-content.js
scripts.serve: npm run compile && npm run copy && npm run sass && npm run hbs
scripts.start: npm run serve && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run serve && rollup -c && npm run copyDist
